content: of round 3 repeat row 1-5 for each of the four petals finish row 5 of fourth petal at ** fasten_off weave in yarn ends on back of ßower finish with a light steam blocking to help your petals sit beautifully if desired this may or may not be necessary depending on the yarn & hook size you have chosen thank you very much for making this crochet road pattern i hope you enjoyed creating these and if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact me at crochetroad@gmail com iõd love to see your completed work - if you use the following hashtags on social media we will be more likely to see your amazing creations #crochetpoppy #crochetroad letõs get social instagram - @crochetroad facebook - crochet road facebook group - crochet road community ravelry - crochet road - joy clements youtube - crochet road this pattern is an original crochet road design and is for personal use only it may not be copied shared translated published altered edited or distributed either online or ofßine you may not reproduce this pattern in other formats - for example but not limited to - videos graphs photo-only tutorials or charts you are free to sell items made from this pattern as long as they are made by yourself in a small number please mention crochet road joy clements as designer in your product listings & on tags please use your own photos to promote and sell your items thank you and have a wonderful day ©crochet road all rights reserved poppy flower 10 crochet road poppy flower 11 crochet road
